entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
